Installation

Requirements

You need to have installed QGIS in your computer. This plugin was tested on Windows using QGIS 3.28.9-Firenze.

Plugin installation

For the QGIS plugin installation follow the next steps:

  1. Download the latest zip file of the plugin available in the repository.

  2. In QGIS open the Plugins Manager

  3. Go to the Install from ZIP section and install the plugin using the zip file

  4. A message to install additional packages may appear, click yes to install

Required additional packages

This plugin requires additional python packages that can be installed by using the plugin and following the instructions:

  • rasterio

  • pycocotools

  • torch

  • torchvision

  • opencv-python

  • deepforest

A dependencies folder with the required packages will be added in the plugin root folder.
